positions.description: - Worked on a portfolio of clients while being a part of Statutory Audits & Limited Review assignments of listed and unlisted companies. Operated predominantly on a listed aviation company (with an asset base leading up to INR 100,000 million)- Performed extensive audit procedures and analytics with limited supervision on operating expenses and finance costs (amounting INR 60,000 million, >90% of gross revenues); Debt, leases, trade payables, and maintenance provisions which account for over 80% of total liabilities.- Reviewed and assessed the consolidation of financial statements of a medical equipment manufacturing company, considering the impact of business combinations and treatment of goodwill and deferred taxes.- Analysed cash flow projections for next four quarters of the aviation client for the purpose of impairment testing and going concern assessment.- Reviewed compliance of Indian Accounting Standards (Ind AS) and requirements of Schedule III under the Companies Act, 2013 by our clients while preparing financial statements.- Independently drove the preparation of audit deliverables including auditor’s report, CARO Report, IFCoFR report and audited financial statements of various engagements, and managed tax audit assignments of multiple entities in line with the regulations of ICAI and Income Tax Act, 1961.- Received appreciation from Engagement Partner and Director for exemplary work ethics, along with firm-wide performance-based awards.- Participated in an FP&A assignment with India’s 2nd largest low-cost carrier, focusing on Projected Route-wise Operating Margin Analysis based on scheduled flights data for the upcoming month.- Analysed various aviation sector variables such as available seat kilometers and block hours to compute Revenue & Cost per ASKM (i.e., RASK & CASK) and evaluate route-wise operating profit or loss.- Performed projected-to-actual reconciliation to assess the viability of the model and derive meaningful conclusions.
positions.title: Audit Analyst
positions.description_html:
- Worked on a portfolio of clients while being a part of Statutory Audits & Limited Review assignments of listed and unlisted companies. Operated predominantly on a listed aviation company (with an asset base leading up to INR 100,000 million)
- Performed extensive audit procedures and analytics with limited supervision on operating expenses and finance costs (amounting INR 60,000 million, >90% of gross revenues); Debt, leases, trade payables, and maintenance provisions which account for over 80% of total liabilities.
- Reviewed and assessed the consolidation of financial statements of a medical equipment manufacturing company, considering the impact of business combinations and treatment of goodwill and deferred taxes.
- Analysed cash flow projections for next four quarters of the aviation client for the purpose of impairment testing and going concern assessment.
- Reviewed compliance of Indian Accounting Standards (Ind AS) and requirements of Schedule III under the Companies Act, 2013 by our clients while preparing financial statements.
- Independently drove the preparation of audit deliverables including auditor’s report, CARO Report, IFCoFR report and audited financial statements of various engagements, and managed tax audit assignments of multiple entities in line with the regulations of ICAI and Income Tax Act, 1961.
- Received appreciation from Engagement Partner and Director for exemplary work ethics, along with firm-wide performance-based awards.

- Participated in an FP&A assignment with India’s 2nd largest low-cost carrier, focusing on Projected Route-wise Operating Margin Analysis based on scheduled flights data for the upcoming month.
- Analysed various aviation sector variables such as available seat kilometers and block hours to compute Revenue & Cost per ASKM (i.e., RASK & CASK) and evaluate route-wise operating profit or loss.
- Performed projected-to-actual reconciliation to assess the viability of the model and derive meaningful conclusions.
